1. If your sister?s husband divorced his wife, then the divorce will be valid even if it was through Canadian court divorce procedures. We do not know what type of divorce your sister?s husband issued her. However, if he issued her one straight forward divorce, then that will constitute one Talaaq-e-Raj?ee (revocable divorce). If he revokes the divorce before the expiry of the Iddat, then she has reverted to be his wife. If he did not revoke the divorce until the expiry of her Iddat, then the divorce is converted into an irrevocable one and the Nikah has terminated. She may then remarry another person.%0D%0A%0D%0A2. It is very encouraging to note that you are doing your Aalim course. Your condition has come before me at a time when I was deciding this morning to write a detailed article on the importance of seeking knowledge and encouraging the Muslims especially in Western countries like US, Canada, England, etc.%0D%0A%0D%0Aand Allah Ta'ala Knows Best%0D%0A%0D%0AMufti Ebrahim Desai%0D%0AFATWA DEPT.%0D%0A%0D%0AI make this plea after my frequent travels in the past decade to many North American (US and Canada) States provinces and Cities. Hereunder are some of my observations:%0D%0A%0D%0A1. It is no hidden fact that most of the Muslims in western countries have migrated there for better worldly prospects. Many children have grown up as Americans rather than Muslims. I have come across many American youth not having an idea of what Azaan is. %0D%0A%0D%0A3. People started frequenting the Masaajid and began benefiting from the educational programmes.%0D%0A%0D%0A7. The fading spark of Imaan due to mundane activities are again brightened and the realisation of guarding one?s Deen have dawned upon many Muslims throughout North America, Alhamdulillh.%0D%0A%0D%0A8. The greatest drawback in North America is the proper understanding of Deen and the lack of reliable and competent Ulama. In a western country like South Africa with an approximately 40 million population, there is less than 1% Muslims. It had a similar beginning like North America until an effort was made to educate our children and make them Ulama. The Ulama have worked tirelessly in educating the public and conditioning their minds according to Islamic values and ethos. Alhamdulillah, students from many parts of the world and even professionals enrol themselves in these traditional Darul Ulooms and benefit from the discourses of the Ulama.%0D%0A%0D%0A9. I have observed the recitation and discourses of many students and they seem to have a tremendous impact on the public.%0D%0A%0D%0A11.
